title: 5 Reasons Why We LOVE Mini ITX PC's!
description: Mini ITX systems have both positive and negative aspects but after moving a few systems over to the smaller footprint, we've realized there's a lot to love about them.  Let's go over a bunch of reasons why you should seriously look into building a mini-itx PC.
